item.description:
Come out and join us for a night of  dealer's choice poker at Ken's place in Glastonbury.  Wild cards, high-low pots, strange poker variants you've never heard of, and lots of laughs will be in store.  This event will be more about socializing and having a good time than bringing home big bucks, so the stakes will be appropriately low:  dime, quarter, half-dollar with a maximum of 3 raises.

Ken will provide some basic snacks, but please BYOB, and feel free to bring a snack to share, as well, if you're so inclined.  Remember to bring $1 for Nina to help keep this awesome meetup group running.

Feel free to email Ken or Mitch with any questions.  Because only 7 people can attend this event, please update your RSVP as soon as you know you have a change in plans.  Each member can RSVP for themselves plus one guest.
item.how_to_find_us: Take route 2 West to exit 10. Take a left onto route 83. Second right onto Eastbury Hill Road. Third right onto Colton. 2nd house on right. Park in driveway or on street.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Dealer's Choice Poker at Ken's in Glastonbury
